metadata.title: CVE-2014-2893 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The GetHTMLRunDir function in the scan-build utility in Clang 3.5 andearlier allows local users to obtain sensitive information or overwritearbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary directories withpredictable names.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2893` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

clang-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
clang-3.5-examples - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
clang-format-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
clang-modernize-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
cpp11-migrate-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
libclang1-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
liblldb-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
libllvm3.5v5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
lldb-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
llvm-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
llvm-3.5-examples - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
llvm-3.5-runtime - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
llvm-3.5-tools - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
python-clang-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
python-lldb-3.5 - 1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

clang-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
clang-3.6-examples - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
clang-format-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
clang-modernize-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
cpp11-migrate-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
libclang1-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
liblldb-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
libllvm3.6v5 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
lldb-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
llvm-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
llvm-3.6-examples - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
llvm-3.6-runtime - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
llvm-3.6-tools - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
python-clang-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
python-lldb-3.6 - 1:3.6-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-3.5 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.5.2-0ubuntu1').
llvm-toolchain-3.6 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.6-2ubuntu1').
